'''Adventurer of the Shimmering Woods''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenges]] in [[Avidya Forest]], [[Lokapala Jungle]], [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Ashavan Realm]], [[Vissudha Field]], [[Lost Nursery]], and [[Vanarana]].
